summary: A mod that enhances the detail and colours of over 40 different plants and grasses within Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/qm0xwIv.png[/img]

[size=3]Sexy Skyrim; Grasses and Plants is a mod that I have decided to produce to Inject a bit of colour into Skyrim. The majority of vanilla foliage is rather dull, and this mod will ensure that you get the beautiful and vibrant colours that you deserve in a world such as Tamriel.

With over 40+ Grass/Plant textures being colourised, your experience in the wilderness will be like nothing before. With this Mod, you can say goodbye to whitewashed weeds, and Hello to Green grasses!

[b][color=#ff00ff]Want to take a look? [url=#]Watch the video[/url] below![/color][/b][/size]


[youtube]hIxwdAfd_7Y[/youtube]

[size=3][b][color=#ff00ff]FAQ:
[/color][/b]
[b][color=#ff00ff]Q: [/color]Will this affect my framerate, or slow my game down in any way?[/b]

[color=#ff00ff]A: [/color]No way! This is simply a re-textural mod, and no difference will be made when it comes to performance.

[b][color=#ff00ff]Q:[/color] My foliage doesn't look identical to yours? Whats gone wrong?[/b]

[color=#ff00ff]A:[/color] The screenshots presented to you were taken whilst using the "Immersive Saturation Boost" mod. I would recommend using this alongside my mod, for the best results.

[b][color=#ff00ff]Q: [/color]Do you have plans to make future Sexy Skyrim mods?[/b]

[color=#ff00ff]A: [/color]You bet! From Tree bark to Mountain mods, I can assure you there is more to come.

[b][color=#ff00ff][url=#]Update[/url] Notes:[/color][/b]
Currently No notes to be Displayed.

[/size][b][color=#ff00ff][size=3]Compatibility: 
[/size][/color][/b][size=3]If you have any queries about the compatibility of this mod, then look no further! Here is a list of mods that have been proved to be compatible with this mod:

 - Unique Grasses and groundcovers

-Grass on Steroids

[color=#ff00ff][b]If you happen to find any [url=#]alternative[/url] mods that are also compatible, please inform me. [/b][/color]

[/size][b][size=5]OTHER MODS IN THE SEXY SERIES!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/l86szAi.jpg[/img]
[/size][/b]

[color=#ff00ff][size=4][b]Thank you, and enjoy the Sexiness!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/FnRqPjI.png[/img][/b][/size][/color][/center]
author: Fi5h1fishy
